loading
----------------------------------------

supported formats

- yaml
- json
- toml

.. code-block:: python

   from dictknife import loading

   loading.setup()

   # load
   d = loading.loadfile("foo.yaml")
   d = loading.loadfile(None, format="yaml")  # from sys.stdin

   # dump
   loading.dumpfile(d, "foo.json")
   loading.dumpfile(d, None, format="toml")  # to sys.stdout
